text: ai rasool ahale kitaab mein se jin logon ne kuphr ikhateyaar kiya vah aur musharekeen ye nahin chaahate hain ki tum par tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se bhalaee (vahee) naazil kee jae aur (unaka to isamen kuchh ijaara nahin) khuda jisako chaahata hai apanee rahamat ke lie khaas kar leta hai aur khuda bada phazal (karane) vaala hai
